aboutThisUseCase.name: Extend SAP ERP 6.0 (ECC) business processes on SAP BTP
aboutThisUseCase.description: This project contains a reference application (including mock server), showcasing an end-to-end development scenario for an SAP ECC extension on SAP BTP
aboutThisUseCase.author: i.belozerov@sap.com

executeBeforeAccountSetup.description: Delete created directories with the code base if any

executeAfterAccountSetup.description: >> STEP 1/8: Get the Business Partner Validation app code
executeAfterAccountSetup.command: git clone https://github.com/SAP-samples/cloud-extension-ecc-business-process.git /home/user/repos/cap && cd /home/user/repos/cap && rm package-lock.json && npm i --silent

executeAfterAccountSetup.description: >> STEP 2/8: Building multi target application assets for Business Partner Validation app
>> STEP 3/8: Deploying the built multi target application for Business Partner Validation app
>> STEP 4/8: Get the mock server code
executeAfterAccountSetup.command: git clone -b mock https://github.com/SAP-samples/cloud-extension-ecc-business-process.git /home/user/repos/mock && cd /home/user/repos/mock && rm package-lock.json && npm i --silent

executeAfterAccountSetup.description: >> STEP 5/8: Building multi target application assets for the mock server
>> STEP 6/8: Deploying the built multi target application for the mock server
>> STEP 7/8: Create destination to the mock server
>> STEP 8/8: Bind the mock server to the Event Mesh instance
executeAfterAccountSetup.command: cf bs mock-srv BusinessPartnerValidation-ems && cf start mock-srv
